addNotify() - Method in class net.java.dev.colorchooser.demo.ColorPickerFrame
 
adjustColor(float, float, float) - Method in class net.java.dev.colorchooser.ColorChooser
Adjust the color in HSB color space by the passed delta values, constraining saturation and brightness values to the range 0.0 to 1.0, and cycling the hue continuously through the range 0-1 such that > 1 = value - 1.
AlphaPalette - Class in net.java.dev.colorchooser
